casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Markeith R. LAWRENCE. No. 293A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 21, 2005. Amy C. Kunstling, Assistant Attorney General, Howard S. Boney, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of July 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Markeith Rodgers Lawrence) shall have up to and including the 31st day of August 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of July 2005."
